quote: Failure is The Way of Success
author: Chiranjit Paul

quote: Failure is a part of success.
author: Hank Aaron

quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Failure is an opportunity to reflect and realize.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Failure are given power, not success ..
author: David S. Mark

quote: Failure is always an option
author: Adam Savage

quote: Anybody can fail.
author: M.G. Hardie,  It Ain't Just The Size

quote: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Failure is just another way to learn how to do something right.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: Every failure is a step to success.
author: William Whewell

quote: One fails forward toward success.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: We are all failures- at least the best of us are.
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Failure is an event, never a person.
author: William D. Brown

quote: Failure is not an option. Everyone has to succeed.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: It's failure that gives you the proper perspective on success.
author: Ellen DeGeneres,  Seriously... I'm Kidding

quote: If I fail to succeed, I have succeeded in failing.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Success is more difficult to handle than failure.
author: Ravi Zacharias

quote: Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the road to achievement. One fails forward toward success.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Forget about the consequences of failure. Failure is only a temporary change in direction to set you straight for your next success.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: You mark and celebrate errors, transforming failures into successes.
author: Dejan Stojanovic,  The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: The only guarantee for failure is to stop trying
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Failure is when you give up. A real winner is someone that doesn't give up, even when it feels like they are losing.
author: Joshua Hartzell

quote: When youâ€™ve tried everything and failed, try everything else and succeed
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
author: George E. Woodberry

quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
author: George Edward Woodberry

quote: If you try to fail, and succeed, which have you done?
author: George Carlin

quote: Failure is a reality; we all fail at times, and it's painful when we do. But it's better to fail while striving for something wonderful, challenging, adventurous, and uncertain than to say, "I don't want to try because I may not succeed completely.
author: Jimmy Carter,  Sources of Strength: Meditations on Scripture for a Living Faith

quote: Like success, failure is many things to many people. With Positive Mental Attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: You always pass failure on your way to success.
author: Mickey Rooney

quote: Sometimes the only way to succeed is to fail backwards
author: Benny Bellamacina,  The King of Rhyme

quote: Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: True success cannot be achieved until you have experienced failure
author: Brian A. Leslie

quote: A failure establishes only this, that our determination to succeed was not strong enough.
author: C.N. Bovee

quote: Translation is the art of failure.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: If your failure is not a lesson, it's indeed a failure.
author: Ogwo David Emenike,  The Fortune in Failing: Decoding the Message of Failure

quote: Failure is instructive. The person who really thinks learns quite as much from his failures as from his successes.
author: John Dewey

quote: The difference between Success and failure is not giving up.
author: Steven Redhead,  The Solution

quote: As an outside; don't worry about failure, because failure will take care of itself. Focus on success.
author: Henry Cavill

quote: The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down.
author: Stephen Richards,  Cosmic Ordering: You can be successful

quote: What you perceive as a failure today may actually be a crucial step towards the success you seek. Never give up.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year

quote: When you fail, that is when you get closer to success.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Success needs no explanation. Failure does not have one that matters.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: The line between failure and success is so fine. . . that we are often on the line and do not know it.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: There is something good in all seeming failures. You are not to see that now. Time will reveal it. Be patient.
author: Sivananda Saraswati

quote: Failure results from lack of focus and half trust. Success results from complete devotion and utmost trust.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It's how you deal with failure that determines how you achieve success.
author: Charlotte Whitton

quote: You never fail until you stop trying.
author: Albert Einstein
